Job Postings that work

Posting are powered to reach thousands of people looking for work at a company like yours. So you can find the best person for the job.

We recommend our product.

Reach more local talent

Workopolis has been around for 16 years, which means our network is huge. As a trusted Canadian brand, we’re constantly growing, so your job postings get in front of the talent you want.

Share to Social

The social world is where a lot of recruiting happens, so we push every job to our Facebook and Twitter pages. This puts your postings in front of people looking for work, even when they’re not actively searching, so you get all the exposure you possibly can.

Connect with e-mail

Job postings get sent directly to people who match the skills and experience you’re looking for, so your role gets in front of the right people.

Recruitment Centre - The ATS for the Rest of Us

Applicant Manager is our handy tool included with every job posting. Recruit anywhere, anytime and rate and screen applicants from any device.

  • Sort through qualified applicants and easily rate talent.
  • A sleek resume view lets you screen candidates easily.
  • Status markers let you track an applicant from screened to hired.

Post a job that does everything you want it to. And then some.

Video Interviewing

Screen applicants before you decide to bring them in with the convenience of a recorded video interview - a great tool for getting the insight you need on skills and personality.

Buy now for $225

Niche - Industry Target Job Posting

Reach industry-certified professionals and get your job posting in front of qualified talent for roles that can be challenging to fill through with access to our extensive network of industry-specific sites.
